DataElement.preferredName: Malignant Anal Neoplasm Proctoscopy Sigmoidoscopy Diagnostic Procedure Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to the diagnosis, through the procedures of endoscopic examination of the rectum (proctoscopy) or the luminal surface of the sigmoid colon (sigmoidoscopy), of a malignant anal neoplasm (cancer), carcinomas that arise from the anus and include anal canal and anal margin (perianal skin) carcinomas.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Malignant Anal Neoplasm Proctoscopy Sigmoidoscopy Diagnostic Procedure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the diagnosis, through the procedures of endoscopic examination of the rectum (proctoscopy) or the luminal surface of the sigmoid colon (sigmoidoscopy), of a malignant anal neoplasm (cancer), carcinomas that arise from the anus and include anal canal and anal margin (perianal skin) carcinomas.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cancer relating to the anus.  Tumors of the anal margin (below the anal verge and involving the perianal hair-bearing skin) are classified with skin tumors.

Concepts.definition: A primary or metastatic malignant neoplasm that affects the anal canal or perianal skin.  Representative examples include carcinomas, lymphomas, and melanomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: Endoscopic examination of the rectum.:Endoscopic examination of the luminal surface of the sigmoid colon.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Endoscopic examination of the luminal surface of the sigmoid colon.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.origin: AMC CRF:AIDS Malignancy Consortium Case Report Form
